TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ALAssetsLibraryWriteCompletionDelegate(NSUrl assetURL, NSError error);
.class public auto ansi sealed ALAssetsLibraryWriteCompletionDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Url to the saved image, null if the file was not saved.
If there was an error, this contains the code, otherwise the value is null.
Docs.summary: A delegate that is used as the resultBlock parameter in calls to the and methods.
